entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH, Ulukhaktok
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:21 a.m. MDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Blowing snow at times this morning. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Blowing snow at times overnight. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Blowing snow at times.
